content.description: Refer to the graph and the information below.
content.question: The function f is defined on the closed interval [0,8]. The graph of its derivative f' is shown above. At what value of x does the absolute minimum of f occur?

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
